text: bastiyo waalo ka jo (maal) Allah ta’ala tumhaare lade bhide baghair apne rasool ke haath lagaaye, wo Allah ka hai aur rasool ka aur qaraabath waalo ka aur yatimo, miskino ka aur musaafiro ka hai, ta ke tumhaare daulath mandho ke haath mein hee ye maal gardish karta na reh jaaye aur tumhe jo kuch rasool de le, lo aur jis se roke ruk jaao, aur Allah ta’ala se darte raha karo, yaqinan Allah ta’ala saqth azaab waala hai
